response.overview: "BACK TO HEAVEN AGAIN " tells us a story of a rich father & two sons, it is about father's unconditional love and forgiveness.The younger son asks for his portion of inheritance from his father, The younger son is prodigal & pleasure-seeking. he wastes all his wealth and falls into poverty. He repents and decides to return home. The father of the prodigal son welcomed him back home and treated him like a beloved son.
response.title: Back To Heaven Again
